content: विसृज् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To abandon, leave, give up; विसृज सुंदरि संगमसाध्वसं <ls>M. 4. 13</ls>; पूर्वार्धाविसृष्टतल्पः <ls>R. 16. 6</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 78.</ls> {@--2@} To let go, let loose. {@--3@} To shed, pour down; तद्विप्रयोगाश्रु समं विसृष्टं <ls>R. 13. 26.</ls> {@--4@} To send, despatch; भोजेन दूतो रघवे विसृष्टः <ls>R. 5. 39.</ls> {@--5@} To dismiss, allow to go, send away; प्रतिगृह्य वचो विससर्ज मुनिं <ls>R. 8. 91</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 19.</ls> {@--6@} To give; <ls>R. 13. 67</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 7.</ls> {@--7@} To send or cast forth, emit, dart; विसृजति हिमगर्मैरग्निमिंदुमर्यूखैः <ls>Ś. 3. 2.</ls> {@--8@} To drop, let fall, strike; विसृज शूद्रमुनौ कृपाणं <ls>U. 2. 10.</ls> {@--9@} To utter; <ls>Śi. 15. 62.</ls> {@--10@} To cast off, repudiate. {@--11@} To create, produce. {@--12@} To deliver, hand over to. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To emit, pour forth, shed. {@--2@} To send away, dismiss. {@--3@} To spare. {@--4@} To cast off, repel, repudiate. {@--5@} To lose.
